publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5695 Hugh Henry: Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Robert Brown*

S2M-5695 Hugh Henry: Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Robert Brown
